game.name: Super Racing GT  Drag Pro
game.description:
Do you think that you have a best racer within you? Is it your dream of racing a sports car in a popular competition and bringing glory to your country? If this is the case, we have brought to you a brand new racing game where you are going to play as a heroic racer. Would you like to accept this challenge? Join Super Racing GT Drag Pro and be prepared to drive your car and fight against the top racers of the world!

There is no need to show mercy on them as you can only win if you beat them all. Look at the screen as you would face a plenty of competitors in different clans in this HTML5 car game! Get ready to race your vehicle against a big boss that is more dangerous than you thought of! It will be amazing to test your racing abilities on a wide array of fabulous drag strops from all across the world in this cool drag racing game.

Controls of this car mobile game are very simple and look realistic. Put your fingers on the right button to gear shirts perfectly and maintain a balance between acceleration and gear changing! Win race to collect enough cash to buy upgrades for your drag racer! Hey boys! You can also use those cash to purchase new and advanced vehicles. Good luck to enter the biggest racing competition and see if you are able to conquer the strip! Have fun without download no matter which age group you belong to!
